entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.0Â°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
